name: Kitchen One-wall
description: For some, a one-wall kitchen is nothing special, for others the concept is unusual. One-wall kitchens are generally encountered in small homes or efficiency apartments where floor space is very limited. ... In the case of a one-wall kitchen all the appliances, cabinets and countertops are gathered on one wall.

name: Betroom Double
description: Double room does not necessarily mean there is a double bed in the room, although it does mean it is big enough for one. You might want to clarify with an advertiser whether a double room actually has a double bed in.
